data.author: Nev Rawlins

changelog.release_notes: Fixed display problem with Quick Views

data.description:
Watchface based on the world symbol used to represent the World Wide Web.

Hours are represented by the outer segments of the world
Minutes fill the small blocks within the larger four middle segments
The 60th block represents AM/PM (filled for PM)


All colors are configurable and the AM/PM indicator can be switched off.


The animation shows: 5:57PM, 2:45AM, 9:33AM, 12:14PM

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed display problem with Quick Views

data.title: WWW

data.author: Simply
data.description:
This is a paid watchface with a free 24 hour trial. You can purchase it for $0.99 individually or $5.99 for a bundle that includes all watchfaces made by Simply, present and future.

== Features ==
A clean and spacious watchface for easy viewing.

- Languages: English, Español, Deutsch, Nederlands, Français, Italiano
- Anti-aliasing for smooth text
- Custom color configuration
- 12 / 24 hour time
- Imperial / Metric units
- Weather powered by OpenWeatherMap or Weather Underground
- Temperature & Condition
- Steps
- Battery
- BT Icon & Vibration
- Disable Health option
- Hourly Vibration
- Master Key Support (pmkey.xyz)

Remember to leave a ❤ if you enjoy using Simply Shift!

Simply develops elegant watchfaces with a single focus and creates its design around it. For more information, visit simplywatchfaces.com

Designed & Developed by Elijah Kang

Copyright © 2017 Elijah Kang
data.title: Simply Shift

data.description:
Grad is an alternative way to look at the time at a quick glance.

The weather shows :
- Weather current condition
- wind strenght (See the app config)
- Current temp / max temp of the day

- Battery capacity

Lets continue to make Pebble live !

data.author: Christophe Jeannette
data.description:
Dots is an alternative way to look at the time.
The last column indicate the hours, the 3 others indicate the minutes.

Some inspiration from the great TTMM designs

The weather shows :
- Weather current condition
- wind strenght (See the app config)
- Current temp / max temp of the day

- Battery capacity

First screen : 7h35
Second screen : 1h22

Lets not allow Pebble to die !
data.title: Dots

data.author: aocodermx

changelog.release_notes: Fixes "Application not responding problem" when wheater is not shown.

data.description:
Minimalistic watchface to display weather icons, date, time, and the battery dots. A simple buy great way to see the battery level on your watch.

Features:

  * Optional Weather Icon
  * Optional Date in different formats
  * Time in various formats, 12 hours, 24 hours, 24 hours binary and 24 hours BCD (My favourive)
  * Optional battery dots ( one dot per each 10% of battery )
  * Offline configuration page (Thanks to Clay)

Please report any bug or error. Also any suggestion will be welcome.
data.title: SimpleDots

data.author: Andrew Bryner

changelog.release_notes: Fixed a bug which caused crashing when returning to watchface from other apps.

Fixed calculation for the optional alternate time zone (in settings you can choose to show a different time zone instead of the weather).

However, Daylight Savings Time or other seasonal time differences may cause the time to be incorrect for your chosen location. After choosing a time zone, make sure to confirm that the time displayed on your watch is correct before relying on it!

data.description:
Singularity is designed to be clean and readable with extra details on demand. Shake or tap to see the current date, weather*, UV Index**, moon phase, an optional alternate time zone***, and more. 

* Weather updates require entering an API key in the settings. You can obtain an API key from OpenWeatherMap.org (http://openweathermap.org/appid)
** UV Index is provided by epa.gov (US Only)
***Alternate time zone is calculated by the GMT offset. The time at your selected location may differ due to Daylight Savings Time or other reasons. Please make sure to confirm the time displayed on your watch is correct before relying on it!

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed a bug which caused crashing when returning to watchface from other apps.

data.title: Singularity

data.author: ttmm
data.description:
This is a paid watchface. $0.99 + local taxes. You have 24h trial. Payment is handled through KiezelPay www.kzl.io/nexttmm

NEXTTMM - time is an abstraction. The external squares, like in an analog watch, show hours. Inside, the smaller squares show five minutes' periods. Above and below, extra information and even more after a shake. You can set up lines to: time, steps, active time, distance, date, weekday, week number, year and temperature. More settings: temperature F or C, date in EU or US format, hourly vibration, BT alerts and status, nine color presets and color customization. Watchface uses Pebble Master Key for Wunderground weather. Date language localization: English, Français, Deutsch, Español, Italiano, Polski. PARTTMM is 4.0 ready. Design: Albert Salamon. Programming: Gregoire Sage. Copyrights © Albert Salamon 2017
data.title: NEXTTMM

data.author: Nev Rawlins
data.description:
Watchface showing a rural landscapes with some buildings and the roads to them / linking them with a backdrop of mountains in the distance.

Time is shown in 12-5-9 format:
- 12 hours (mountains at top)
- 5 10-minutes (buildings)
- 9 single minutes (roads).

The first 4 roads (minutes) join up the positions of the buildings (10-minutes).  The remaining 5 are from the viewers position (bottom of the screen) to those 

positions.  


Images:
(1) Animation of time from 11:48 to 11:57
(2) 06:45
(3) number layout for each group
data.title: Mountain Backdrop

data.author: ttmm
data.description:
This is a paid watchface. $0.99 + local taxes. You have 24h trial. Payment is handled through KiezelPay www.kzl.io/halfttmm 

HALFTTMM - divide and rule. Big rectangle is 6 hours. Long one stands for one hour. All of them are cut into quarters, and five minutes' portions are made from slices of single minutes' rectangles. More information after a shake. You can set up lines with: steps, active time, distance, date, weekday, week number, year, temperature and battery status. More settings: temperature F or C, date in EU or US format, hourly vibration, BT alerts and status, nine color presets and color customization. Watchface uses Pebble Master Key for Wunderground weather. Date language localization: English, Français, Deutsch, Español, Italiano, Polski. PARTTMM is 4.0 ready. 

Design: Albert Salamon. Programming: Gregoire Sage. Copyrights © Albert Salamon 2017
data.title: HALFTTMM

data.author: Muchen
data.description: Watchface that is inspired by HP 50G's interface. Features authentic fonts and stack view.
data.title: HP 50g

data.author: ttmm
data.description:
This is a paid watchface. $0.99 + local taxes. You have 24h trial. Payment is handled through KiezelPay www.kzl.io/parttmm 

PARTTMM - part of the art in time. Long horizontal rectangle is an hour. Small rectangle stands for 10 minutes, square stands for 5 minutes. Big rectangle covers 6 hours. Below - extra information and even more after a shake. You can set lower lines to: time, steps, active time, distance, date, weekday, week number, year,  temperature and battery status. You can activate more options after shake. More settings: temperature F or C, date in EU or US format, hourly vibration, BT alerts and status, nine color presets and color customization. Watchface uses Pebble Master Key for Wunderground weather. Date language localization: English, Français, Deutsch, Español, Italiano, Polski. PARTTMM is 4.0 ready. 

Design: Albert Salamon. Programming: Gregoire Sage. Copyrights © Albert Salamon 2017
data.title: PARTTMM

data.author: chops
data.description:
It's basically just a simple analog watch, with the hands represented by shapes.  Hours are represented by the diamond (or smaller square), and minutes the larger square.  If shown, seconds are represented by the triangle.  For Pebble Time watches, each shape can be coloured individually.

Different background options are available, and there's also a blank option where  you can set a background colour.

The date is shown in the center circle, and can be switched off, as with the battery indicator.
data.title: Shapes

changelog.release_notes:
- Settings
- Four languages : English, French, Italian, Russian
- Slicker animations (on/off)
- Battery instead of the seconds (Battery friendly)

data.description:
Implemented by Douwe Maan. 
Slightly modified by Christophe Jeannette and me in order to add :
- Settings
- Four languages : English, French, Italian, Russian
- Slicker animations (on/off)
- Battery instead of the seconds (Battery friendly)
- Automatic and manual languages
- BT Disconnect Icon & Vibration (on/off)
- Hourly Vibration (on/off)
- 'Do not disturb' setting
- American Date Format (on/off)
- Format 24/12 hour (on/off)
- Picture of charge
- Picture of full charge('100' instead '00')

Envisioned as a watchface by Jean-Noel Mattern (Jnm), who posted it in the "Watch-face ideas" thread on the Pebble forums.
Based on the display of the Frebox Revolution, which was designed by Philippe Starck.

data.author: Nev Rawlins
data.description:
Watchface inspired by Vario Nato Ocean Chevron watch strap.

Time shown in 12-5-9 format:
- 12 hours at top
- 5 10-minutes in middle
- 9 single minutes at bottom.

The current hour/10-minute/single minute is orange, the others light blue.  For 10-minutes or single minutes, if the value is zero, then all the shapes are light blue.

To show an example, the animation shows time from 6:53 to 7:02.

The second image shows the number layout for each group.


Watchface Design & Programming Copyright © 2017 Nev Rawlins
data.title: Ocean Chevron

data.author: YouMagine
data.description:
This watchface is based on the Triangles watchface. But this one has random triangles every time you come back to your watchface! It has settings to turn date on or off, choose colors of time/date.

The colors of the triangles can be based on either the battery level (the more empty your battery the more red your triangles are) or based on your steps, starting at red and the more you hit your average the greener your triangles will be.
data.title: Triangles Plus

data.author: Simply

changelog.release_notes:
- Hourly Vibration has been changed to Periodic Vibration ( Off, 15 minutes, 30 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours )
- Periodic Vibration is automatically disabled while Quiet Time is active ( no more unwanted vibrations while sleeping )
- Quiet Time will show an icon if it’s active
- Added 9 new languages: Czech, Slovak, Catalan, Turkish, Portuguese, Polish, Hungarian, Swedish, & Norwegian
- Fixed BT icon bug on Classic models
- Fixed >2 character bug for temperature on monochrome displays
- Made changes to the settings page and KiezelPay display message
- Fixed leading zero on date format

data.author: Nev Rawlins
data.description:
An analog watchface with the Union Jack as a background.

This was requested on the Pebble Forums by Matt Slafka who wanted a watchface with analog hands over the British flag, similar to that on one of the Lambretta Milio watches.  I like the shape of that watch case, so have included a configuration option to frame the flag/hands with it.

Thanks to Sam Jerichow for his Photoshop help with the watch case.

The full list of configuration options:
1. Show/hide Lambretta Milio case shape
2. Show/hide seconds (to conserve battery)
3. Show/hide day of week
4. Show/hide AM/PM
5. Show/hide date & choice of format
6. Show/hide Bluetooth connection
7. Show/hide battery indicator
data.title: Union Jack Analog

data.description: "Battleship!" by Boss Country Rapper tells the time using two battleships. Tip: The middle/center of each battleship is exactly aligned with the analog hand position of the current hour/minute, respectively.

data.author: KristofWillen

changelog.release_notes:
- Fix day-of-week digit alignment
- Fix Kiezelpay issue

data.description:
Inspired by the dashboard of my car, Full Throttle shows the time in a unique way.  Hour/minutes are displayed by two gauges, with their numberes centered within for easier readability.  

On top of that, a battery indicator is show as well.  It turns red (orange) when below 10% (20%).  

Date and day of week have their own icon.  It features the day of month displayed in the center of the icon, while the day of week is displayed as an increasing colored arc.  Monday starts at 12h, with every day, the arc length is increased 1/7th. 

Finally, step count has an icon as well, where current and average step counts are depicted using colored arcs.

Full throttle is a premium watchface, which can be used free of charge during the first 24 hours. After that, a price of 0.99$ is requested.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Fix day-of-week digit alignment
- Fix Kiezelpay issue

data.author: DLevine.us

changelog.release_notes: - Color watches will now display 0 in the gray bullet used on to distinguish shuttle trains (Zero and O were never used on the NYC Subway to avoid confusion)

- When the 10 hour is greater than 10 the 1 was drawing with a green circle. Changed the way we figure out what number is there.
- Swapped station names W4 for B'Way Junction
- Fixed mismatched minutes for running station_load(); in the tick_handler.

- Significant code optimizations
-- Added all circle drawing into a single function
- Bug fixes

- Bug Fixes
- Added support for Emry builds
-- Interface changes to support the larger Pebble Time 2
- Enabled Support for Diorite and Pebble 2
- Continued improvements to 24hr support and Pebble Round compatibility

- Official Aplite support
- Bug fixes for 24 hour mode

- Aplite release of NYCTime 
- This release is based on the original (Pre-PebbleTime) code

- Removed Aplite support color's don't show correctly in hardware
- Will add separate Aplite release

- Moved the defined layer update process to init(). This reduces the number of times the 'dirty' circle layer is redrawn when the time changes. Since the system calls the process automatically on time change we only need to call it initialization.

- moved some unnecessary global variables into there associated functions (x and posH)

- Removed App logs used for testing

Please see the Github page for full change description

Code optimizations related to time display.
- Consolidated text layers and removed some unnecessary font loading
- See Github link for full changes to this version.

NYCTime
- Initial color release
- Includes colored sections for supported Time series devices
- Cycles through 23 popular station names

data.description:
New York Subway Watchface
- Design inspired by NYCT platform signage
- Time displayed in transit inspired colors
- The upper text cycles through popular stop names as displayed on the platform signs

*There are significant changes in the latest version if you are updating and it fails, please try uninstalling it and restarting your watch before reinstalling.*

latest_release.release_notes: - Color watches will now display 0 in the gray bullet used on to distinguish shuttle trains (Zero and O were never used on the NYC Subway to avoid confusion)

data.title: NYCTime

Old skool fun..

Just a representation of an old skool record player.  

The tone-arm has minutes which rotate around the outer of the record, while hours rotate closer to the center, with the date in the very middle, surrounded by the battery charge. 

Supports 12/24hr modes. Bluetooth indicator at the 12 position.

data.description:
Simple and clean watchface, inspired by Fossil Q style smartwatch.
It shows date and weekday, battery status, quiet mode and bluetooth connection status.

UPDATE:
Version 1.1 allows to set colours for time, date, weekday and dials. It is also possible to hide the leading zero in time (i.e. 01:23 becomes 1:23).
Colours can be manually set through configuration page, provided that the toggle "Use Default color scheme" is disabled.

Version 1.0 allows to choose between three flavours (standard, dark and light, to enhance visibility).
The watchface now supports both 12 and 24 hours clock style and allows to set font size for time, date and weekday.
All settings are available in the dedicated page on the smartphone application.

latest_release.release_notes:
UPDATE 1.1

data.author: KristofWillen

changelog.release_notes:
- Larger orbit for blue (minute) moon, in order to improve readability
- Move Saturn frame move to init instead of update function (improves battery and obnoxious Saturn jump when returning from menu)
Remove some debug code, fixing health data representation

data.description:
Saturn system : a complete mini planetarium featuring the planet Saturn and some of its moons.  For all the astro geeks out there.  Saturn rotates once every 12 hours around its axis, where the bright side of the ring features as an hour hand.  The blue planet represents the minute hand, and rotates Saturn every hour.  The red planet features the battery percentage - it also has a retrograde orbit (counterclockwise).  The yellow and green planets represent health data : green for actual step count percentage, yellow for average step count.  

This Saturn system exists in a parallell universum where the laws of Keppler do not apply :)

latest_release.release_notes:
- Larger orbit for blue (minute) moon, in order to improve readability
- Move Saturn frame move to init instead of update function (improves battery and obnoxious Saturn jump when returning from menu)

data.title: Saturn System

data.author: Nev Rawlins

changelog.release_notes: Fixed problem with DD/MM date format and 24 hour digital time format

data.description:
A variant of the Casio Edifice ERA-200DB-1A

The design idea and black & white image came from Peter Fletcher, but I've had help from two developers via Discord: NiVZ (who also provided color images) and chops. Thanks guys.


Variations from the original:
- the current second, if wanted, is a moving black shape in the 2 arc arrays at top
- the battery meter indicator below (red 10-2%, yellow 30-50%, green 60-100%)
- the digital number below that can be time or date (MM/DD or DD/MM)
- A or P bottom left indicating AM or PM
- Bluetooth icon bottom left blanks when connection lost (& watch vibrates)
- large circular dial image can be configured to show (on a shake):
... Compass - move hand for a short period to calibrate this
... Steps

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed problem with DD/MM date format and 24 hour digital time format

data.title: Edifice ERA-200DB-1A

Support for Pebble and Pebble 2 watches. 
Customizable colors for individual bars.
Customizable bounds for temperature bar.
Text is now outlined.
Customizable text and text outline color.
Options for bar style: solid or outlined.
Footsteps icon for steps bar.
Text will resize based on number of bars.
Text is vertically centered on bars.
Minor text fixes.

data.description: ProgBars is a super-customizable watchface that displays all the information you would ever need on a watch in a compact, vibrant, easy to read fashion. Choose different bars to show time, date, temperature, step count, and battery. You can choose the color of each bar as well as the text and background. The bars can be drawn either solid or outlined. There are trillions of possible combinations!

data.author: Maxwell Moseley
data.description:
Pebble Round Exclusive

See time pass as a process instead of detailed and discrete points.

This watch intentionally discards details like minutes, dates, and seconds allowing for an approximate, and thus more relaxed view of time.

Inspired by Botta-Design's NOVA All Black.

data.author: chops
data.description:
v1.5: added a RECT background option (ps. the grey rings will overlap tics a bit, but you can turn them off if you want)
-------


A variation of the Casio Edifice EQB-500DC-1A

The initial idea for a pebble version of this this watchface came from another developer NiVZ via Discord,  with additional ideas and input from Peter Fletcher via Nev Rawlins.  As such, other variations, eg supporting the OG/P2, may pop-up here in the appstore.

This version is only built for the Pebble Time and Pebble Time Round.

The battery meter indicator (lower right) is always present - the other two inner dials can show either your steps (num - top) and step progress (left), or simply the digital time (top) and day of week (left).

Step functionality is the same as in the original 'stride' watchface example, in that it shows a step progress circle in Red until you reach the goal determined by the previous day steps - once reached the line turns white.  Additionally your average step num. is shown by a small thin stroke.

Other features include,
 - very small A or P shows (lower left) when your watch is in 12hr mode
 - date is shown on an angle (lower right)
 - the seconds hand can be disabled
 - a bluetooth icon is top left - a plane icon shows here when BT is disconnected
 - all hand colours are customisable
 - a Quiet Time icon displays (upper right) when it's activated
data.title: Edifice EQB-500

data.author: Gabriele Cossu

The weather is updated every hour to preserve battery.

Day light duration added shown inside the watch.
Extended the configuration page. You must provide an Open Weather API Key to get right info.

data.description:
* Consider ♥ if you enjoy this watchface *

Sfera is a highly customizable watchface that gets the most of the smartwatch capabilities:

Settings
- Clock Mode: Analog / Digital /Dual/ Mix watchface
- Date 
- Dots as minute markers
- Autodetection of 12h/24h clock based on your watch settings
- Battery level
- Weather on °c or °f.
- Location: city or neighbourhood when available
- Optional Night theme
- Weather providers: Yahoo, WUnderground and OpenWeatherMap
- pmkey.xyz implemented


Autotranslating
Weekday based on your phone and watch settings. Languages supported:
- English
- Spanish
- German
- French
- Portuguese
- Italian

*This capability hasn´t been fully tested. Contact me if you see bugs

Check the watchface TextWatch Clima clicking on "More from this developer"

data.author: Woogal
data.description:
View passing ships with your very own submarine periscope!

Sun/moon and ships move slowly across the screen throughout the day, so the time can been seen through the scope even with the clock turned off.

Sunrise and sunset are at 6am/6pm, with the sun or moon directly above at midday/midnight. Ships sail slowly across the screen from right to left each hour so minutes can be roughly guessed at (see screenshots for examples).
data.title: Dive! Dive! Dive!

data.author: Elijah Kang
data.description:
Free

==Overview==
When one Pebble isn't enough... here comes Extend! Now you can dust off those old Pebbles sitting in the drawer and dumb it down to make yourself a regular clock. Each Pebble can show 1-2 digits of the time in fullscreen and with an odd number of Pebbles, you can display the date.

==Features==
- Supports 2 - 5 Pebbles
- 12 / 24 hour time
- Date: Day of the Week or Month
- Languages: English, Español, Deutsch, Nederlands, Français, Italiano

Remember to leave a ❤ if you enjoy using Extend!
data.title: Extend

data.author: Igor Zalomskij
data.description:
Displays the current and next events from the Google Calendar and timing.today service (see the website link)
The app will alert you when the time is right before the event or before the end. Control the time remaining until the end of the event, or the time that remains until the next event.
And also the date and weather on the screen.
English and Russian are available.

Also see the application timing.week
Do not forget to set up the application via smartphone.
data.title: timing.today

data.description:
Gemstone uses gem stone types in order to define a color theme for your watch.  Choose out of seven gem stones ranging from ruby to diamonds, each with their color attribute.  On the outside, a health ring is displayed with the current and average weekday step count.
Other information shown is date, hour and battery.

Gemstone is a premium watchface, which costs 0.99$ (+ local taxes) through Kiezelpay.  A trial period of 24 hours is provided, after which a purchase is requested.

latest_release.release_notes: Fix an issue with the date/date-of-week layer (overlay of both layers + overflow of date layer)

data.description:
YMMWOPS (You Make Money While Other People Sleep). Keep 24/7 track of the exchange rate of the Bitcoin! You can set a low and high rate on which the watchface advises you to buy or sell Bitcoins. Never miss a $500 plunge or a $500 rise and act immediately. On treshold amounts the watchface will vibrate so you can sell or buy on the right moment.

$2.99 with a 24 hour trial period. Expensive? You will earn it back on your first move!

Fully color configurable, 12/24 hour support, battery warning, BT status indication and many other options. USD, EURO and GBP supported, other currencies on demand. Dutch, English, German, Spanish, French and Italian display text.

TTMMCHART+ race with a time. Steps, hours and minutes. You can activate details after shake and set up 3 lines with extras: steps, active time, distance, week number, year, battery. data.author: VilleV

changelog.release_notes:
Added option to disable animation for power savings.
Disabling the animation you get about 1 day of extra battery life (on Time Steel).

100 Hearts! Thanks!
- animate calendar-forecast switch
- new option to switch display every minute

Added option to lock the weather location. Use this after you are happy with current weather GPS location and wish to keep using it, forever. You may disable location services on your phone afterwards.

- changed battery low from 40% to 30%
- changed battery critical from 20% to 10%
- Fixed forecast time markers when time changes (day light savings)
Small changes to 12h AM/PM forecast time markers

- Fixed long overdue BT-icon for BW displays
- Option to enable/disable forecast grid
- Option to show 6h/12h time intervals on forecast grid
- Option to translate weekdays
Weather forecast chart now shows the chance of rain for B/W displays
Hour markers every 6h are better, imo
Forecast chart hour lines every 00 and 12 hours
Fixed a bug in forecast rendering if fetch fails. Now using old data until new one is available.
Added option to only shake twice to change display mode. First time it will show seconds and another 2 shakes will change mode (calendar, forecast).

data.description:
100 Hearts! Wow! Thanks for your support and feedback. Lets celebrate with an animation! Calendar and forecast switch is now animated and you can schedule the switch to happen every minute.

Shows following information: time, date, weather, calendar, current steps count and battery estimation bar in the calendar.

You can configure the week start day, temp units and weather provider.

Weather forecast works only with WeatherUnderground provider (for now). Shake 3 times to switch between calendar and forecast.

Calendar shows last, current and next week. 

Battery estimation is displayed after first full charge. Estimation is adjusted according to usage and keeps changing over several charge cycles. 

Step count is compared to daily averages. Orange = less than 60% of average. White = 60-95% of average. Green = over 95% of average. 

Shake twice to display/hide seconds.

Feedback/improvements? I'm happy to help! Just drop me an email.

This watchface is based on "Simple Time and Calendar" by Michael S.
data.title: Simple TCS

data.author: ttmm
data.description:
This is a paid watchface. $0.99 + local taxes. You have 24h trial. Payment is handled through KiezelPay www.kzl.io/ttmmaze 
TTMMAZE - labyrinth of hours. Hours are spiral of lines - to read time - just count thick lines. Digits below on the left stands for minutes. You can choose extra line information such as: temperature, date or battery status. You can activate details after shake and set up 5 lines with extras: time, temperature, steps, active time, distance, week day, week number, year, battery. More settings: temperature F or C, date in EU or US format, hourly vibration, BT alerts and status, color presets and color customization. Watchface uses Pebble Master Key for Wunderground weather. Date language localization: English, Français, Deutsch, Español, Italiano, Polski. TTMMAZE is 4.0 ready. TTMM collection won Silver and Gold A Design Award in Interface and Interaction Design Category. Design: Albert Salamon. Programming: Gregoire Sage. Copyrights © Albert Salamon 2016
data.title: TTMMAZE

data.description:
This is a paid watchface. $0.99 + local taxes. You have 24h trial. Payment is handled through KiezelPay www.kzl.io/10ttmm 

10TTMM - time evolution. Minutes are divided in six groups of nine dots. Each dot represents a single minute. Every ten minutes the group transforms itself into one square. You can set upper line to temperature, active time, steps, date or seconds and on the right you can show battery status. You can activate details after shake and set up 3 lines with extras: steps, active time, distance, week day, week number, year, battery. More settings: temperature F or C, date in EU or US format, hourly vibration, BT alerts and status, three color presets and color customization. Watchface uses Pebble Master Key for Wunderground weather. Date language localization: English, Français, Deutsch, Español, Italiano, Polski. 10TTMM is 4.0 ready.

TTMM collection won Silver and Gold A Design Award in Interface and Interaction Design Category. Design: Albert Salamon. Programming: Gregoire Sage. Copyrights © Albert Salamon 2016

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed bug in BLCK&GRAY color preset

data.author: chops
data.description:
12 jun: added a 'steps' ring for widget 2. Outer ring is steps progress for the day, inner ring is your daily step goal/average.



My take on a familiar style.  The time font is Futura bold italic.  On colour pebbles the time font is aliased for increased smoothness.
 
Weather is updated at 30min intervals via yahoo.

When disconnected an X appears over a phone icon. 

Top left is the quiet time icon.  The icon will disappear when quiet time is enabled.

Supports 12/24hr modes.

If selected the health circles are as follows,

outer-most = step count
then, active calories for the day so far,
then, time active for the day so far,
then (inner-most) = distance progress

Where health is available, across the bottom, or very middle for the PTR, are steps - for OG & Steel models without 'health' the month is displayed.
data.title: Activ8

* Consider ♥ if you enjoy this watchface *

Add some weather to your TextWatch! This watchface brings the weather conditions straight to your wrist.

- German

- Italian
- Portuguese
- Norwegian

- Swedish

- Dutch

Features
--------

1.2 : Fixed the spacing on 24-hour watches to be more adaptive; now it stays in the middle until it becomes necessary to scoot up.
1.1 : Fixed bug at 0:00 for 24-hour mode watches.
